meta.disclaimer: openFDA is a beta research project and not for clinical use. While we make every effort to ensure that data is accurate, you should assume all results are unvalidated.

results.reason_for_recall: The labels on two-liter batches of Regular and Diet Wild Cherry Pepsi were mistakenly swapped during production. This is potential safety issue for individuals who are sensitive to phenylalanine (i.e., phenylketonuric) or who are diabetic.
results.distribution_pattern: Massachusetts, Connecticut, Maine, New Hampshire and Vermont
results.product_description:
Regular Wild Cherry Pepsi two liter plastic bottles
UPC 1231100
results.code_info: Best Before Date of Feb2513 and a Manufacturing Code of PF11282

results.distribution_pattern: CA, KY, LA, MN, MS, NC, NJ, NY, OH, OK, PA, TX, VA
results.product_description: Jody's, Breast Cancer Awareness Kettle Corn; Net Wt 3oz  in clear cellophane bag.

results.reason_for_recall: Korean canned Medium Smoked Oysters, Napoleon brand, are recalled because the product has been prepared, packed, or held under insanitary conditions whereby it may have become contaminated with filth, or whereby it may have been rendered injurious to health.
results.distribution_pattern: Products were distributed in California, Oregon, and Washington.
results.product_description:
Napoleon canned, Smoked Oysters, Medium.  Item no. 48-312.  Net WT. per can is 3.66 oz (106 g). The UPC is 0 41253 00312 7.

The product is labeled in parts:
"***NAPOLEON***Medium***SMOKED OYSTERS***NET WT. 3.66 OZ (106 g)***INGREDIENTS: SMOKED OYSTERS, SOYA OIL, SALT***PRODUCT OF KOREA***FARM RAISED***".
